Delete:
always @ (posedge tx_lclk_p)
	ecfg_tx_debug_signals[15:0] <= {2'b0,                     //15:14
					e_tx_rd_wait,             //13
					e_tx_wr_wait,             //12
					emrr_rd_en,               //11
					emaxi_emrr_full,          //10
					emaxi_emrr_prog_full,     //9
					emaxi_emrr_wr_en,	  //8			
					emrq_rd_en,               //7
					esaxi_emrq_full,          //6
					esaxi_emrq_prog_full,     //5
					esaxi_emrq_wr_en,	  //4			 
					emwr_rd_en,               //3
					esaxi_emwr_full,	  //2			 
					esaxi_emwr_prog_full,     //1
					esaxi_emwr_wr_en          //0
					};
Add:
always @ (posedge tx_lclk_par)
	ecfg_tx_debug[15:0] <= {2'b0,                     //15:14
				e_tx_rd_wait,             //13
				e_tx_wr_wait,             //12
				emrr_rd_en,               //11
				emaxi_emrr_full,          //10
				emaxi_emrr_prog_full,     //9
				emaxi_emrr_wr_en,	  //8			
				emrq_rd_en,               //7
				esaxi_emrq_full,          //6
				esaxi_emrq_prog_full,     //5
				esaxi_emrq_wr_en,	  //4	 
				emwr_rd_en,               //3
				esaxi_emwr_full,	  //2	 
				esaxi_emwr_prog_full,     //1
				esaxi_emwr_wr_en          //0
				};
